**Supplementary Figure 1: Gating strategy for spectral flow cytometry (SFC) panel.** The dot plots illustrate the gating strategy used to identify the main ILT nodes for a representative HIV-unexposed (HU) infant, with descending hierarchial gates denoted by arrows. Individual gates and frequency in the parent gate are shown.
